item.description:
Hello All,

Happy Valentine's Day!!!!

Please take a moment to read the complete update below.... Thank you to all who attended (and posted photos) our January Meetup! It was a great success and nice to see some new and familiar faces.
Our winter meetups continue to be held at Doggie Day Playcenter at 1PM, Tremont Street (South End) Boston.
Also, I will be holding a special FREE MAGAZINE SUBSCRIPTION GIVEAWAY for Chihuahua Connection Magazine!!! Yes, I know what you are all thinking "there's actually a dedicated publication for chihuahuas out there?" !!!!
Yes, there is.......and here is your chance to win a subscription for free... At 8pm tomorrow (01.27.08), I will be posting 3 questions on our message boards on the meetup site. Just login and the 1st TWO MEMBERS who POST all three answers correctly will win a free subscription....... Only registered Boston Chihuahua members can participate and the certificate will be given to the winners at our next Meetup!

Please check out ChihuahuaConnection.com for more info regarding the publication, they are also holding a special for a one year's subscription at $14.95....
It's something fun and the magazine offers some insightful info from nutrition to breeders to adopting pets....and it's all about chihuahuas
I am also updating our "Polls" section, so please take a moment and offer up some feedback...it's multiple choice, so be honest!!! I have no way of knowing who agrees or disagress!!!! It really helps me, help our group!


Note:
There is some free parking located behind Doggieday Playcenter and the CVS, for non-residents of the area there are also plenty of metered spots near DoggieDay located on Tremont street as well as "South End visitor parking spots" located on each end of the street in the South end . Although those may be harder to come by.

Stay well....ST




DOGGIE DAY PLAYCENTER ( 400 Tremont Street, South end, Boston,02116 ...our usual location 1:00PM ONLY!
http://www.doggieday....
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua February Meetup
